system.description:
When you would get @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.OnoZsu0tZybyqesF]{Taken Out}, heal 2 damage instead. This does not stop the Overlord from making you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.overlord-moves.Item.BOBrp1ZWbYp6AMDN]{An Offer You Can't Refuse}.

When the Overlord makes you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.overlord-moves.Item.BOBrp1ZWbYp6AMDN]{An Offer You Can't Refuse}, you will always accept their offer, but your power is great enough that you can negotiate. Add a caveat of your choosing to their terms.
